effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.

flavorTexts.text:
Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its
wings. This may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
